name: Zombie Shooting Apocalypse X 3: Kill All the Dark Souls to Survive the City of Rising Dead and Stay Alive!
name_original: Zombie Shooting Apocalypse X 3: Kill All the Dark Souls to Survive the City of Rising Dead and Stay Alive!
description:
Wack the un-dead beasts to survive the dead world 60 years after the apocalypse!

Enjoy this ultra-killing zombie shooter game and blast their guts in to pieces like a pizza! Whack them hard and explode their heads. Become a boss in killing those un-dead monsters with superpowers! Don’t die like a dumb! It’s your war to save the world. They blocked all spaces in the earth. It all started from the darkest zombie land. So destroy those monsters with super powers in their land now! Don’t get whacked by those ultra-violent beasts!

What’s inside for you?
Amazing gumball style art work with horror theme and music
Super shooting and head esploder fun
No need wifi to be online – u can play offline
Different types of zombie enemies
Different types of deadliest guns to purchase

What are you waiting for then? Take your gun and rush to save the dead world. Say bye to the zombie age and horror & kill em all!
Share the fun with your friends and families J
Happy Killing
x
